    ABOUT ME

    BIOGRAPHY

    The Hong Kong University of Science and Technology (Guangzhou).

    I am a Tenure-Track Assistant Professor in the Data Science and Analytics Thrust and the Internet of Things Thrust, Information Hub, Hong Kong University of Science and Technology (Guangzhou). My research focuses on interdisciplinary areas of artificial intelligence, network systems, and network economics. Multiple PhD openings are available [Details]. If you are interested, please email me your CV and transcripts!

    BIOGRAPHY
